title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - April 27th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - April 27th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring:

- Jim Ellis on the rise of ’Generation Z’

- Tommaso Ebhardt details the life of Sergio Marchionne

- Chris Flavelle on climate-resistant cows

- Plus, and interview with Robert De Niro on the business of the Tribeca Film Festival

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
